extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected H2 Database Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the H2 database version is between 1.1.100 and 2.0.204 to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the H2 database version affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Update H2 Database
extracted_playbook.description: Update the H2 database to version 2.0.206, released on January 5, 2022, to mitigate the vulnerability.
